title: Travel + Leisure Recognizes Five Red Carnation Hotels as "World's Best"
text:
Travel + Leisure Recognizes Five Red Carnation Hotels as "World's Best" July 16, 2015 11:03 ET | Source: The Red Carnation Hotel Collection 
DELRAY BEACH, FL, July 16,   The Red Carnation Hotel Collection is pleased to announce that Travel + Leisure listed five of their luxurious properties in the publication's coveted 2015 World's Best Awards . Ashford Castle , ' 41 ,' The Egerton House Hotel and The Milestone Hotel were awarded No. 3, 11, 38 and 66 respectively among the prestigious list of World's Best Hotels " Top 100 Hotels ." 
The hotel collection celebrated recognition in other categories as well. The Chesterfield Mayfair made its debut as No. 14 in the " Europe - Large City Hotels " category, while ' 41 ,' The Egerton House Hotel and The Milestone Hotel placed No. 2, 4, and 7 in the " Europe - Small City Hotels " category. Ireland's Ashford Castle , which recently completed extensive renovations and refurbishments, was awarded No. 2 in the " Europe - Resorts & Inns " category. 
"We are honored that the discerning readers of Travel + Leisure consistently rate our hotels among the World's Best," said Jonathan Raggett, managing director of The Red Carnation Hotel Collection . "This recognition is a true testament to the skill and dedication of our staff as well as the loyal support of our phenomenal guests." 
About The Red Carnation Hotel Collection The Red Carnation Hotel Collection is an award-winning collection of five- and four-star family-run boutique hotels in London, Dorset, Guernsey, Geneva, Palm Beach, South Africa and Ireland. Each property has its own individual character and unique location that reflects the local environment, culture and cuisine. They all share the qualities central to the Red Carnation's ethos that win them so many prestigious awards - splendid luxury, generous hospitality, inventive and traditional cuisine, private art collections, passionate service and loyal staff committed to creating richly rewarding experiences for all their guests. For more information about The Red Carnation Hotel Collection, please visit us at www.redcarnationhotels.com or email book@rchmail.com . Connect with us on Facebook , Twitter and Instagram and share your #RCHexperiences. Image Download: For up-to-date, high resolution images, please visit The Red Carnation Hotel Collection Image Library at media.redcarnationhotels.com . 
About The TreadRight Foundation Created as a joint initiative between The Travel Corporation 's family of brands, The TreadRight Foundation is a not-for-profit working to ensure the environment and communities we visit remain vibrant for generations to come. To date, TreadRight has supported more than 35 sustainable tourism projects worldwide. The Foundation's guiding principle is to encourage sustainable tourism development through conservation, leadership and support for communities. TreadRight's past project partners include WWF, Conservation International and The National Trust in the UK. Current initiatives include sponsoring the National Geographic Society's inaugural "World Legacy Awards," helping to combat wildlife crimes with WildAid, and empowering individuals with the Alliance for Artisan Enterprise. To learn more about our past and current work at TreadRight, please visit us at TreadRight.org .
